DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objectives To evaluate 3-month event-free survival combination combination itraconazole pemetrexed patient recurrent/refractory non-small cell lung cancer . Secondary Objectives To determine objective response rate combination itraconazole pemetrexed patient recurrent/refractory non-small cell lung cancer .
